headline: Analog Devices price target raised to $364 from $291 at Truist
summary: Truist analyst William Stein raised the firm’s price target on Analog Devices (ADI) to $364 from $291 and keeps a Hold rating on the shares. The company delivered a strong Q4 and even stronger Q1 outlook, driven by a combination of cyclical demand, idiosyncratic factors, and expected price increases, the analyst tells investors in a research note.President's Day Sale - 70% OffUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of the market with th
